short_summary: TBIPS (Task-Based Informatics Professional Services) Under TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) Method of Supply
description: Browse link embedded in notice URL; bid submission deadline: November 21, 2022 14:00 (EST); this bid solicitation aims to satisfy a requirement for the Infrastructure Canada (INFC) department.
full_summary:
**Title:** TBIPS RFP - Task-Based Informatics Professional Services for Infrastructure Canada (INFC)
**Reference Number:** WS3682788831-Doc3682820425
**Amendment Number:** 8
**Publication Date:** October 19, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, November 21, 2023, at 14:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 9, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** TBD

**Notice Information:**
This government tender announcement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) method. The tender is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Office of Infrastructure of Canada (INFC).

**Eligibility:**
Only suppliers holding a valid TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing, in all required resource categories, and located in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are eligible to participate.

**Contract Requirements:**
The contract is for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to support the infrastructure projects of Infrastructure Canada (INFC). The contract will be awarded based on a competitive process using a combined evaluation of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender complies with the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
If you are interested in participating, please contact Nader Akkila from SPAC/PSPC at:

nader.akkila@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(electronic mail)
Note: The Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments are only accessible through a SAP Ariba account with a completed Government of
